extendedInfo.description: Legal Eagle- directs the user via questions through a decision tree to a series of informative and concise educational videos made exclusively for this app. Definitions as to the specialties of law and the precise limitations as to each specialty is also provided, allowing the user to determine which specialty best suits the situation. The app uses the userâs location to provide geographically relevant attorneys for consultation. Premium subscribers will have a link to their website adjacent to their address allowing for easy communications. In addition, common legal issues are defined by the app with a discussion of the ramifications concerning each issue.This app will greatly benefit users who are in need of emergency legal consultation, especially if something occurs when traveling. What do you do now? There are no yellow pages and if you are in a strange city and require legal representation? You are left to your own devices, whereas with this app- all you need to know is at your fingertips!
